amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $30.5 million from the IRS to the High Intensity Drug Trafficking Areas Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase (by transfer) the amount for "High Intensity Drug Trafficking Areas Program" by $30,500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 212 - 216 (Roll no. 173).
